subject: Fanatec compatibility
description_text:
Hi,

Is the following product compatible with a Fanatec DD wheelbase? I couldn't
find it on the product page.

https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-steering-wheel-s1

Thanks!

Kind regards,

Sven

conversations.body_text: Hi sven degen,    Our quick-release mount has a 70mm hole spacing. If you have suitable connecting components, it can be used compatibly without any issues.
